articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Ton-up Tony de Zorzi, IPL-bound Nandre Burger guide South Africa to eight-wicket win over India in 2nd ODI - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tony de Zorzi slammed a hundred to complement a superlative effort by his team's bowlers, led by pacer Nandre Burger, as South Africa humbled India.  | Cricket
articles.content: Opener Tony de Zorzi slammed a magnificent maiden hundred to complement a superlative effort by his team's bowlers, led by pacer Nandre Burger, as South Africa humbled India by eight wickets in the s… [+4219 chars]
